title: How many centuries out are we from a society that doesn’t struggle with race issues? - Quora

response.answer_text: Ide have to do some math. This is just a sci-fi answer thats only half serious. Ultimately communism will take over the world. This will allow eugenic policies. If we continue to move refugees around the world and cross breed, we can breed out race eventually. No more different ethnicities. The US will probably be a single race within 3–500 years if I had to guess. Europe is already pacing that same time frame. A genocide or 2 in Africa + their new silk road, a war between china and India, the middle east ripping itself apart. I think we can safely guess that in under a millenium racial divides will be non existant. and then we’ll have a few breakaway civilizations that will have their own rules..

With the current trend of people to victimize themselves over stuff that completely ended three generations ago, Probably never. If people start to realize that bitching about such relatively old events and start looking for the future. Probably three days.
